metadata.title: David Villanueva | Software Engineer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of David Villanueva, a Full Stack Software Engineer specialized in modern web technologies.
metadata.author: David Villanueva

hero.title: David Villanueva
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer
hero.description: I build accessible, responsive, and high-performance web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about clean code and solving complex problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Full Stack Developer with experience building web applications using React, Next.js, Node, AWS, MySQL, Docker, and other technologies. I hold a university degree in Programming and am committed to continuous improvement and professional growth. I am skilled at acquiring new competencies and efficiently implementing them to deliver exceptional results.
about.description2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring places on my motorcycle, listening to good music, or experimenting with new technologies. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

skills.title: Skills & Experience
skills.subtitle: I have worked with a variety of technologies and frameworks throughout my career.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development.

0.title: Software Engineer
0.description: Developed applications in React. Developed applications in Next.js. Maintenance and new features in Angular. Maintenance and new features in NestJs. Development using AWS. Implementation of reusable components (Angular/React). Participated in 4 projects with different technologies.

1.title: Software Engineer
1.description: Deployed the main system using Docker, resulting in reduced server costs (ELK). Promoted the use of Redux to streamline code maintenance and scalability.
